snippet: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena may need to raise up to 5 billion euros ($6.9 billion) through an upcoming capital hike, rather than the 3 billion euros originally planned, Italian news agency ANSA reported on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Monte Paschi May Need to Raise Up to 5 Billion Euros in Cap Hike: ANSA
headline.main: Monte Paschi May Need to Raise Up to 5 Billion Euros in Cap Hike: ANSA

lead_paragraph: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena may need to raise up to 5 billion euros ($6.9 billion) through an upcoming capital hike, rather than the 3 billion euros originally planned, Italian news agency ANSA reported on Monday.
